EditorMenu_SyncToTodoAndReplace: Sync to Microsoft Todo and replace
PluginDescription: An obsidian plugin that syncs Microsoft Todo
Settings_Todo_DefaultListName: The default synchronization Microsoft Todo list name
Settings_Todo_DefaultListNameDescription: If it does not exist, the list is created with that name
Settings_JournalFormatting_PeriodicNotes: Consistent with the Periodic Notes plugin
Settings_JournalFormatting_FolderDescrip: Folder where the diary is stored
Settings_Todo_Display_DateFormatDescript: The format used when adding or rendering a date for a task.
Settings_Todo_Display_TimeFormatDescript: The format used when adding or rendering a time for a task.
Settings_Todo_Display_ReplacementFormatD: If you select to replace the task and this is the replacement format, use {{TASK}} as the placeholder
Settings_Todo_Display_AddCreatedAtOnRepl: If you select to replace the task and this is enabled 'Created at {Time Format}'
Settings_Todo_OpenUsingApplicationProtoc: If this is set to true it will open the todo in the locally installed application, set it to off if you want to open the todo in the browser.
